docs.lead_paragraph: 9 P.M. (CBS) FRONT OF THE CLASS (2008) Jimmy Wolk, right, stars as Brad Cohen, who has Tourette's syndrome but defies the odds and becomes a gifted teacher. Patricia Heaton and Treat Williams play Brad's parents in this ''Hallmark Hall of Fame'' presentation, based on a true story. 10 A.M. (Fox) FOX NEWS SUNDAY WITH CHRIS WALLACE Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice discusses her legacy and the state of the nation before moving on to ''This Week With George Stephanopoulos'' at 10 on ABC and ''Late Edition With Wolf Blitzer'' at 11 on CNN.

docs.lead_paragraph: As a harbinger of how an Internet presidency could take form, former Senate Majority Leader Tom Daschle -- who may be nominated as the next Health and Human Services secretary as early as next week -- has embarked on a new format for leading the charge on new health care policies, online and off.

headline.main: Daschle Begins Leading Health Care Reform

docs.abstract: The presumed pick for secretary of Health and Human Services begins a nationwide search for health reform ideas.
